name: Searching for Merleau-Ponty
description:
Searching for Merleau-Ponty

This interactive fiction game is an adaptation of research that combines Part II of Merleau-Ponty's Phenomenology of Perception with a parable of future experiential journalism from Dr. John Pavlik.
